items.name: static var alignMinXInward: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the minimum X coordinate should be to the nearest inward integral value.

items.name: static var alignMinYInward: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the minimum Y coordinate should be to the nearest inward integral value.

items.name: static var alignMaxXInward: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the maximum X coordinate should be to the nearest inward integral value.

items.name: static var alignMaxYInward: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the maximum X coordinate should be to the nearest inward integral value.

items.name: static var alignWidthInward: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the width should be to the nearest inward integral value.

items.name: static var alignHeightInward: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the height should be to the nearest inward integral value.

items.name: static var alignMinXOutward: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the minimum X coordinate should be to the nearest outward integral value.

items.name: static var alignMinYOutward: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the minimum Y coordinate should be to the nearest outward integral value.

items.name: static var alignMaxXOutward: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the maximum X coordinate should be to the nearest outward integral value.

items.name: static var alignMaxYOutward: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the maximum Y coordinate should be to the nearest outward integral value.

items.name: static var alignWidthOutward: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the width should be to the nearest outward integral value.

items.name: static var alignHeightOutward: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the height should be to the nearest outward integral value.

items.name: static var alignMinXNearest: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the minimum X coordinate should be to the nearest integral value.

items.name: static var alignMinYNearest: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the minimum Y coordinate should be to the nearest integral value.

items.name: static var alignMaxXNearest: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the maximum X coordinate should be to the nearest integral value.

items.name: static var alignMaxYNearest: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the maximum Y coordinate should be to the nearest integral value.

items.name: static var alignWidthNearest: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the width should be to the nearest integral value.

items.name: static var alignHeightNearest: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Specifies that alignment of the height should be to the nearest integral value.

items.name: static var alignRectFlipped: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: This option should be included if the rectangle is in a flipped coordinate system. This allows 0.5 to be treated in a visually consistent way.

items.name: static var alignAllEdgesInward: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Aligns all edges inward. This is the same as NSAlignMinXInward|NSAlignMaxXInward|NSAlignMinYInward|NSAlignMaxYInward.

items.name: static var alignAllEdgesOutward: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Aligns all edges outwards. This is the same as NSAlignMinXOutward|NSAlignMaxXOutward|NSAlignMinYOutward|NSAlignMaxYOutward.

items.name: static var alignAllEdgesNearest: AlignmentOptions
items.desc: Aligns all edges to the nearest value. This is the same as NSAlignMinXNearest|NSAlignMaxXNearest|NSAlignMinYNearest|NSAlignMaxYNearest.
